title: How to fight a group of people for survival of your own life - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all, learning arts won’t help you fight against a group of people. In fact, most don’t even teach you how to do it. If you want to learn how to defend against multiple attackers, here’s a few tips: DO NOT run - As soon as you run, you expose your back to attack. If your attacker runs fast enough, he’ll grab you and the rest will beat you to the ground. Running is the worst thing you can do.  DO NOT fight fancy - This is not the movies where you can pull off these flashy techniques in the middle of multiple attackers. Your life’s at stake so you need to be practical. Otherwise, you’re going to get beaten or killed. Circle around your attackers - Keep one in front of the other. Knock them out one by one. As soon as they see each other go down, they’ll likely stop.  Want to learn more? Read and subscribe. Home

Fighting with two or more people bare hand requires more than strength and speed. And if your opponents have weapons you have to be more careful since one strike could be the last one. Here are some of the tips that you can follow to be prepared for some uncertain events. 1- Practice Muay Thai.  This is one of the technique that few people know. It can help you to fight with people who are fighting with hand or weapons. 2- Concentrate  Whether you are studying or fighting, if you are unable to concentrate you will fail. 3-Timing.  While fighting with 2 or more people timing has more importance than any other things. 4-Relax or Don’t be nervous.  This is where most of the people messed up. Don’t be like them. Keep cool and fight hard.
